attributes.action: Changing facilities in every given public place for disabled people.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the parliament to act upon this as I have a 14year old disabled daughter and is double incontinent and I have no where to change her when we are out and about. I have to lie her on a cold and dirty floor to change her nappy! 
Would this be acceptable for a baby? No. So it SHOULD not be acceptable for anyone that is incontinent
attributes.background:
I want it to become compulsory that changing facilities are everywhere in a public place as are baby changes. 
Also mandatory that they are installed when opening or building a new public place. It is within their human rights to be able to have their pad changed with dignity!
